folder: Monroe Street & Montgomery Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
191-201 Monroe Street, north side, between Montgomery and Gouverneur Streets, as seen from the playground on the south side of the street, adjoining P.S. No. 31 (on the right).

March 30, 1934.

P. S. Sperr.

folder: Monroe Street & Montgomery Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Monroe Street, looking east from Montgomery Street, showing new Vladick housing site.

P. L. Sperr
July 3, 1940
